dct_description_sm: V.O Technoexport. Syria. Ministry of Industry. Companion text: Geological framework of the Levant. Volume I: Cyprus and Syria. Volume II: The Levantine Basin and Israel / Valerie A. Krqasheninnikov; John K. Hall; Francis Hirsch; Chaim Benjamini. Jerusalem: Historical Productions-Hall. 2005. 498 p.and 826 p. North Decimal Degree 37.3333. South Decimal Degree 32.300. East Decimal Degree 42.4167. West Decimal Degree 35.700. Map is done with data obtained by the Soviet geologist of V/P Technoexport (Contract no. 944). In left lower margin: "This map, dated 1963, was printed in the USSR in 1964. The printed copies were sent to Syria and several decades later could not be located. This personal copy of V. A. Krasheninnikov has been scanned and is reproduced above." Verso: Structural map of Syria.)
